attributes.action: Change national health guidelines for Hand Foot and Mouth
attributes.additional_details: Implement an incubation period for hand foot and mouth. This illness is affecting the UK massively and we have not one legal incubation period for this. Children are ending up in hospitals due to this illness. We have incubation periods for chicken pots, we need to have one for Hand Foot and Mouth.
attributes.background: Change the incubation period for national health guidelines for Hand Foot and Mouth.

rejection.details: Decisions about guidance on indivdual diseases is a decision for the NHS and UK Health Security Agency, not the UK Government or Parliament.
